name: Meet++
author: Wojciech Warpechowski
description: Zoom, pan and full-screen to improve presentation viewing on Google Meet. Click on the extension icon, then press `Shift` + `Alt` and: `WSAD` to pan, `E/Q` or `+/-` to zoom, `F` for full-screen on/off, `R` to reset, `B` to border on/off. BTW. It also works for videos on any page (not only on Google Meet)!
